Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: BNPP did not alter the excretion of APAP or any of its non - deacetylated metabolites nor did BNPP alter excretion of PAP or its metabolites after PAP doses of 150 and 300 mg / kg .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| --- |
| APAP (Acetyl-P-aminophenol) |
| PAP (Phenolic Acid) |

* BNPP (Benzonaphthyridine) did not alter the excretion of APAP or any of its non-deacetylated metabolites.
* BNPP did not alter the excretion of PAP or its metabolites after PAP doses of 150 and 300 mg/kg.
